pull.title: Wallet: "listreceivedby*" fix
pull.body:
Fixes https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/16159, 

This PR builds on https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25973, fixing `listreceivedby*` RPCs by filtering out `send` addresses using `IsMine` (see https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25973#discussion_r1269477246). It also breaks down the `listreceivedby` tests into subtests and adds a test to verify 'listreceivedby*' does not return `send` addresses

events.message:
test: split 'listreceivedby' tests in subtests

Co-authored-by: Andreas Kouloumos <kouloumosa@gmail.com>

test: 'listreceivedby*' does not return send address

Co-authored-by: Andreas Kouloumos <kouloumosa@gmail.com>

events.body:
Lgtm
Tested ack a35115f17caf550326e12ff3044fe617a1a53fd3

I ran the unit test and functional test (without bdb) and all pass.
Also tested manually using regtest the steps in function ``test_listreceivedby`` and the behaviour is the expected.
Maybe @achow101 or @furszy want to review here?
